dmca.title: Electronic Arts Blocks Mobile Tetris
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am the Director of IP Enforcement for Electronic Arts Inc. ("EA"). It has come to our attention that your website, http://code.google.com (the "Site") contains material that infringes rights under copyright law controlled by EA.

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), 17 U.S.C. Section 512(c)(3), we demand that you immediately and permanently remove and disable access to the infringing materials on the http://code.google.com website. The infringing material is located on at the following locations:

http://code.google.com/p/mobile-tetris/

Under penalty of perjury, I hereby affirm that I have a good faith belief that the information in this notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of EA whose exclusive copyright rights I believe to be infringed as described herein.

This letter is not intended to be a full statement of the facts, and it does not prejudice or waive any claim, whether in law or in equity, that EA may have with respect to this matter or any other matter.

If you have any questions concerning this matter please contact our IP enforcement group at [private]@ea.com

Very truly yours,
[private] [private]
Director, IP Enforcement Electronic Arts Inc.
